sub_title: Former Bureaucrat, International Quiz Master, Published Author, Columnist, Motivational Speaker, Event Host
summary:
Leader in Public Relations and Public Sector Auditing with core competencies in other diverse fields including International Quizzing, Published Writing, Administration and Training.   
Extensive work experience includes core functionalities involving liaise, communication, establishing and maintaining personnel and public relations channels in a Government agency set up, transaction, compliance and performance audit of Indian State Government Departments, Indian Government owned companies, Indian Embassies and missions abroad.  Dealt with planning of audit matrix, audit methodology, audit objectives, execution, issue of AEs,  scrutiny of replies, processing of audit paras, audit summary, processing of reports, review and follow up.  
Leader in other core functionalities pertaining to administration and Government HR.  
Training facilitator for Regional Training Institutes of the Indian Audit and Accounts Department, India.  Proven faculty in Leadership, Motivation, Communication and Team Work topics to various organisations and public forums.

Quiz Master of international repute, having hosted 270+ Quizzing events across various platforms all around the globe.  Featured extensively by the International Print and Electronic media like leading news giants of Malaysian including Bernama-The National News Agency of Malaysia, The Star and The New Strait Times and Astro, Malaysia.  Hosted and organised Quizzing events for highly reputed organisations, top MNCs and International Cultural Wings. Quiz Columnist, Content Writer and Advisor on various social platforms online.

A Quiz Book on "COVID-19 and Other Disease Outbreaks" authored by Phanindra Ivatury would shortly be published by Vigyan Prasar, Department of Science & Technology, Government of India.

A Published Author who writes regular features in the international media, especially to Bernama - The Malaysian National News Agency.  Phanindra's works have also appeared in 'The New Sarawak Times', The Sun Daily, Malaysia and 'Media Permata' in Brunei to name a few.  His short stories have also been published on various competition sites which includes Doug Weller's 6 Word Story Book of 2021.

Freelance Columnist and and Content Writer on motivational management topics, Leadership, Team Work.  Master of Ceremonies having hosted high profile Quizzing and Non-Quizzing events internationally.
